fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.javamail

Class JMStoreExtractor

  • Object
    • fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.core.StoreExtractor
      • fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.javamail.JMStoreExtractor

  • public class JMStoreExtractor
extends StoreExtractor
    StoreExtractor sub-class for mail boxes extracted through JavaMail library.

    For now, IMAP and Thunderbird mbox structure through MailExtract application, could also be used for POP3 and Gmail, via StoreExtractor (not tested).

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.core.StoreExtractor

        CONST_DROP_EMPTY_FOLDERS, CONST_KEEP_ONLY_DEEP_EMPTY_FOLDERS, CONST_NAMES_SHORTENED, CONST_WARNING_MSG_PROBLEM

    • Constructor Detail

      • JMStoreExtractor

        public JMStoreExtractor(String protocol,
                        String server,
                        String user,
                        String password,
                        String container,
                        String folder,
                        String destRootPath,
                        String destName,
                        int options,
                        java.util.logging.Logger logger)
                 throws ExtractionException
        Instantiates a new JavaMail StoreExtractor for protcols or complex containers.
        Parameters:
        protocol - Protocol used for extraction (imap| thundermbox [not tested gimap| pop3])
        server - Server of target account ((hostname|ip)[:port
        user - User account name
        password - Password, can be null if not used
        container - Path to the local extraction target (Thunderbird or Outlook
        folder - Path of the extracted folder in the account mail box, can be null if default root folder
        destRootPath - Root path of the extraction directory
        destName - Name of the extraction directory
        options - Options (flag composition of CONST_)
        logger - Logger used (from Logger)
        Throws:
        ExtractionException - Any unrecoverable extraction exception (access trouble, major format problems...)

      • JMStoreExtractor

        public JMStoreExtractor(byte[] rawContent,
                        String destRootPath,
                        String destName,
                        int options,
                        java.util.logging.Logger logger)

        Instantiates a new JavaMail StoreExtractor for single mail container.
        Parameters:
        destRootPath - Root path of the extraction directory
        destName - Name of the extraction directory
        options - Options (flag composition of CONST_)
        logger - Logger used (from Logger)
        Throws:
        ExtractionException - Any unrecoverable extraction exception (access trouble, major format problems...)
